about_the_game:
Dive into a fantastical adventure where sport and fantasy come together in a world as delirious as it is enchanting. Welcome to "Golf in Wonderland," a unique golf game that transports you to the heart of the wonderland.

In "Golf in Wonderland," you are immersed in the enchanted kingdom of Wonderland, where each level presents a new challenge. Your mission is to conquer a series of extraordinary golf courses, each more surprising than the last. Every hole is a puzzle in itself, requiring much more than simple golfing skills. Discover secret shortcuts to reach the greens in record time.

Each course is inspired by an iconic location in Wonderland and offers a unique visual and gameplay experience. Immerse yourself in dreamlike landscapes.

Different levels propose challenges of increasing difficulty.
Play in multiplayer mode to compete with your friends.
Optimize your route to complete each level as efficiently as possible.

name: Golf In Wonderland

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: i7 7700 3.6 ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1060 gtx
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
